changeSet.author: Tarun

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Yes", "No") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "BF, Are there financial stresses because of the patient's death?");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to BF, Are there financial stresses because of the patient's death?

changeSet.author: Tarun

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Yes", "No") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "BF, Are there any family members who feel anger, guilt, or anxiety as a result of the death?");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to BF, Are there any family members who feel anger, guilt, or anxiety as a result of the death?

changeSet.author: Tarun

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Yes", "No") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "BF, Are there any family members who have disturbing thoughts, images or visions as a result of the death?");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to BF, Are there any family members who have disturbing thoughts, images or visions as a result of the death?

changeSet.author: Tarun

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Yes", "No") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "BF, Are there any sources of social support for the family right now? e.g. community, religious group etc.");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to BF, Are there any sources of social support for the family right now? e.g. community, religious group etc.

changeSet.author: Tarun

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Social support", "Psychosocial Counselling", "Other") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "BF, Type of grief support provided");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to BF, Type of grief support provided

changeSet.author: Tarun

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Social support", "Psychosocial Counselling", "Other") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "BF, Reason for referral");
